path.style: fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 10px; stroke: rgb(123, 0, 255);
fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(168, 0, 255); stroke-width: 10px;

fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(168, 0, 255); stroke-width: 10px;
fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(168, 0, 255); stroke-width: 10px;
fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(213, 0, 255); stroke-width: 10px;
